anya-e0105n4:1_1: Punapi so evamāha ‘‘kiñcāpi buddhaghoso rāmāyaṇamahābhāratasaṅkhātānaṁ mahākabbasatthānaṁ sukusalo viya na dissati,
anya-e0105n4:1_5: tattha gantumpi na vaṭṭatīti dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.13 ca,
anya-e0105n4:1_6: tassa (samphapalāpassa) dve sambhārā bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā tathārūpikathākathanañcāti dī. ni. aṭṭha.
anya-e0105n4:2_0: Taṁ pana purimavacanatopi ahetukataraṁ kevalaṁ anādarīkaraṇamattameva.
anya-e0105n4:2_1: Atigambhīratthassa hi atigarukaraṇīyassa piṭakattayassa atthasaṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ niratthakassa samphapalāpasamudāyabhūtassa
anya-e0105n4:2_2: kabbasatthassa vitthārato pakāsanena kiṁ siyā payojanaṁ,
